# attributedString

**Instance Property**

Returns an `NSAttributedString` object representing the text on the page.

## Declaration

```swift
var attributedString: NSAttributedString? { get }
```

## Working with Textual Content

- **numberOfCharacters**: Returns the number of characters on the page, including whitespace characters.
- **string**: Returns an `NSString` object representing the text on the page.
- **characterBounds(at:)**: Returns the bounds, in page space, of the character at the specified index.
- **characterIndex(at:)**: Returns the character index value for the specified point in page space.

items.description: Returns the number of characters on the page, including whitespace characters.
